recipesJson.name: Chuck Bubble Berry | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Folkart, and special guest mlNikon. To stick with the theme of Bubble Gum which was covered by NOTED this week, we invited mlNikon(Emily) to join us to develop a forest fruit type Gum Ball.  And it turned out fantastic! Full recipe notes on DEVELOPED Episode 49 at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ubZZnro7YEU&feature=youtu.be .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.
Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://i.imgur.com/97yskRE.png)


If you would like to support DEVELOPED, the best way is to check out our LEGACY one shot line at https://www.DIYFlavorChaser.com/developed

reviews.text: Very good recipe, well balanced, American bubblegum has a very nice mouth fell and with the little touch of marshmallow it's beautiful! Well done
I actually specifically ordered the ingredients I was missing for this recipe because it looked interesting.   A good call on my part  because this is a VERY good recipe!  Well done.
